events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role. Our team will review your qualifications and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as a Software Engineer candidate based on your submitted resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your case. They will guide you through the next steps in the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening of your application. Your background matches the key requirements we are looking for in the Software Engineer position.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview. We appreciate your prompt communication.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC. You will receive a calendar invitation with details shortly.
You successfully completed the technical interview. The panel was impressed with your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 25th at 10 AM UTC. This will cover cultural fit and compensation expectations.
Your HR interview went well. Our HR team appreciated your enthusiasm and alignment with the company values.
We are excited to propose you an official offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the offer details and let us know if you have any questions.
Thank you for your feedback regarding the offer. Weâ€™re glad to hear that you are happy with the proposed terms and eager to move forward.
We are thrilled to have you accept the offer. Welcome aboard as a Software Engineer! We look forward to working with you.
Your onboarding process has officially started. You will receive detailed instructions and resources to get you set up and integrated into the team.
The hiring process is now complete. Congratulations on joining the company as a Software Engineer, and we wish you great success in your new role.
